archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Mary and Henley Chapman Carte de Visite c.1865-1875
did.abstract: A Carte de Visite featuring an image of Mary and Henley Chapman from B. M. Clinedinst's Gallery of Fine Arts in Staunton, Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Mary and Henley Chapman Carte de Visite, Ms2009-088, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Mary and Henley Chapman Carte de Visite was purchased by Special Collections in 1994.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the Mary and Henley Chapman Carte de Visite was completed in June 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: B.M. Clinedinst was a photographer serving Staunton, Virginia. The gallery for this photographer was located on Main Street and operated during the 1860s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Carte de Visite with the image of two small children, Mary and Henley Chapman, from the gallery of B. M. Clinedinst of Staunton, Virginia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
